name: Clock Work (Games Made After Job)
description:
Meowdroid is in deadly danger!
Help him survive as long as possible in the Clock Work arena.
His future is now in your hands!

 
Clock Work is a game created over 6 days as part of Xanderjam 5. 



How to play?
WASD to move
Shift to sprint
Space to dash
Left click to attack

Beware of the clock hands! Seconds are coming for you!

Who created Clock Work?
GMAJ: Games Made After Job
Grzegorz - Programmer & design
Wojciech - Programmer & design
Sylwia - Graphic
Konrad - Game idea & design
Patryk - Programmer
Andrzej - Music

To create Clock Work we used this softwares:
Unity, Trello, Discord, Aseprite & Ableton Live 11
Some of the assets(Map) are from https://www.kenney.nl
